segments.text: That woman is going to slip and fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how oblivious she is to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so naughty, taking cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is going to tip over, and the boy is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, like she doesn't have a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch this, it's making me so anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, it's a shame the inside is such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would do something before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
